title: Really good idea  i had for Zed
body: I had a really good idea, when zed ults he will only be able to reactive it to swap if he kills the target.

replies.body: Kinda defeats the purpose of his delayed Ult dmg then doesn't it lad...
Not really, the switchback would just be a reward for killing the target sooner.
Damn, it's a real shame that Zed isn't an Assassin class whose supposed to assassinate people and his kit isn't built entirely around going in, doing enough damage to kill someone then getting out.

wellll I think that kind of destroys his escape in a way, I mean theres only so far a regular shadow or a flash will get you, if you absolutely needed your ult to pull off a great escape you don't want killing someone with it to be a requirement

Yeah but it should be used to kill not to juke... this will make zeds think more and will make them have to use smarter decision making, so they don't just go all in, fail, then just walk away like nothing happens.

Well i use it for both, for the juke and the kill (but mainly to piss off the target)
Anyway, i dont think that's a gud idea, in a way, yes it's good for kills but imagine if u dont get the kill??? 
You're screwed in definitely

That's his whole point dude...

TBH I think that Zed is way too safe to play... Shadow, slice, shadow out. How the heck does he even take damage anyway?

That's the thing, i like zed because, not only is he safe he also needs to skill to get out of the way of damage E.G: Teamfights.

BTW DiamondAries: Ik that's his point :P

well really the whole point of zed is to be more out of the way and slippery than other assassins. I mean master of shadows isn't a title you get for being a face melting ball of death you just drop on your enemies.

Good idea except that one fatal flaw: Zed's generally jump back because their ult will pop, killing the target.
This nerf would probs be too much.
